title.narrative: Procurement Support for National Roads Authority Uganda

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement Support for National Roads Authority Uganda) is a component of Creating Opportunities for Sustainable Spending on Roads (CROSSROADS) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £3,395,361. This component benefits Uganda, and works in the following sector(s): Transport policy and administrative management, Road transport. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Crown Agents Limited, IMC Worldwide, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 01-09-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Transport - Economic Affairs - Transport - national road construction
Transport - Economic Affairs - Transport - policy, planning and administration
